---
name: Crypto-specific feature
about: Add or improve a crypto-specific indicator or utility.
title: "Add crypto-specific [indicator/utility]"
labels: ["crypto-specific", "help wanted"]
assignees: ""
---

## Goal

Describe the market problem (session structure, funding mechanics, orderflow proxy, etc.).

## Reference

List references (exchange docs, TA-Lib equivalent when available, or established formulas).

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] API proposal is clear and typed.
- [ ] Deterministic behavior with documented warmup/edge cases.
- [ ] Test coverage includes realistic crypto scenarios.
- [ ] Baseline performance is acceptable on 10k candles.

## Test plan

Include parity checks, fixtures, and tolerances.
